div.p:
Own Art Representative example: Artwork price £250. Interest rate 0% fixed.Total amount of credit £250, followed by 10 monthly payments of £25.
0% APR Representative. Total amount payable £250.

DegreeArt.com is the UK leader in contemporary, affordable art created by the finest emerging artists. Our online gallery allows you to buy original art and to invest in the artists of the future.To follow the careers of, and buy art from, our featured artists and best sellers, sign up to receive our monthly newsletter and alerts.
